pci_projects_project_training_registry_s: By default, we store private images of your jobs on a Docker Registry managed by OVHcloud, and shared with our customers. The images stored on it can be deleted at any time. We recommend using your private registry to store your own images.

You can then mark your images and upload them to the registry.
